course_name: Essentials of Oral Health Therapy II
description: Provides further training & development of essential skills in oral health therapy, building on from ORAL2070. Comprises integration of dental hygiene practice & dental therapy practice. Provides greater depth on risk assessment, prevention of oral diseases, maintenance of oral health in children & adults & in the management of specific oral health problems. Knowledge & skills obtained will enable more advanced clinical training & greater variety of clinical experiences.
